thread.title: Hundreds sign open letter to Cleveland Clinic regarding hospital's perceived connections to Trump
thread.title_full: Hundreds sign open letter to Cleveland Clinic regarding hospital's perceived connections to Trump

author: Jane Morice, cleveland.com
title: Hundreds sign open letter to Cleveland Clinic regarding hospital's perceived connections to Trump
text: The open letter asks that the heads of the Cleveland Clinic to release a public statement condemning the Trump administration's immigration ban, among other demands.
